data.text: Very nice front office staff , and polite. Room was good neat and clean . Location is very nice near to mall ,metro  and bus . So many restaurants beside of the hotel . House keeping staff were good and polite guys , overall Everything was good …..
data.title: Overall good experience.

data.text: Great hotel. We had nice time in this hotel. It was a group booking for shooting purpose. We enjoyed our stay here. Rooms are really nice. Recently renovated. Modern look. Hotel location is great, very near to metro station. Bus and taxi connectivity is good. Staffs are very friendly. We recommend to family and friends.
data.title: Great hotel in heart of Bur Dubai

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Gurinder Singh, 

Greetings from Concorde Palace Hotel Dubai! 

Thank you so much for posting wonderful review, it’s greatly appreciated. We are elated to hear that you enjoyed your overall experience with us. Your feedback and comments have been cascaded to our team.  

Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us and have the pleasure of welcoming you to Concorde Palace Hotel Dubai. 

Raj Shinde
General Manager
owner_response.author: Sivasankaran Peradath

data.text: It was nice stay. I spent couple of weeks in this hotel. Very good rooms. Hotel is completely renovated. Rooms are very clean and neat. Staffs are very friendly and supportive. Service is good. Excellent location, next to metro station.
data.title: Good hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Syed, 

Greetings from Concorde Palace Hotel!

Thank you for your review regarding your recent stay with us here at Concorde Palace Hotel Dubai.  

Indeed nice to learn how much you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for your kind comments especially about the service you received during your stay, we will share it with the team here and we all look forward to welcoming you back soon for another wonderful experience.

Raj Shinde
General Manager
owner_response.author: Sivasankaran Peradath

data.text:
Great room service with awesome hospitality along with delicious multi cuisine food, clean rooms with floral aroma in all corridors

Nearest to Metro station & having huge market nearby 

Can have exess to airport also & nearest Jumeirah beaches & straight metro to Burj Khalifa
data.title: Great hospitality

data.text: Nice hotel. Our family enjoyed stay here. Staffs are very friendly and cooperative. Rooms are very clean and neat. Hotel looks like a brand new facility. Very close to metro station. Taxi is very convenient. We will come back again.
data.title: Goof hotel
